attributes.action: Pay for private dental insurance for those on benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you have lost your original dentist you may have to go many miles to another still operating a n NHS list.

We urge the P.M. to remove the difficulty and anxiety caused by not having a local NHS dentist for those on state benefits, by automatically paying for a dental insurance scheme such as DenPlan for the unemployed and those on income support or incapacity benefit.
